artist: Karsten Creightney; Zanatta Editions, Shawnee, Kansas; Mitchell Marti; Interbang Press, Santa Fe, New Mexico
description: cartoonish image of barefoot dark-skinned young man wearing striped pants and shirt, kneeling on one knee beside a blacktop road, rolling three dice, with three blue dollar bills next to his PR knee; sunflowers and other plants growing on either side of road; sky shaded in blue at top fading to pale yellow at horizon line, with grey clouds
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Edition

on bac on back in pencil: [Creightney 13]
title: Roadside Gambler
